Headline: O'Hare Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays earlier police activity Harlem(O'Hare). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays earlier police activity Harlem(O'Hare).

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
